plot: Jed is an apprentice electrician and volunteer band teacher who will do anything to get back his pawned (and sold) guitar (signed by Darius Rucker), so that he can get a gig, so that he can ask out Chelsea, the karaoke queen.
title: Hootie
plot_es: Jed is an apprentice electrician and volunteer band teacher who will do anything to get back his pawned (and sold) guitar (signed by Darius Rucker), so that he can get a gig, so that he can ask out Chelsea, the karaoke queen.
plot_en: Jed is an apprentice electrician and volunteer band teacher who will do anything to get back his pawned (and sold) guitar (signed by Darius Rucker), so that he can get a gig, so that he can ask out Chelsea, the karaoke queen.
